Spears::

She looked at Firearm, tears freeflowing down her cheeks. She only 
nodded to him. Her throat was to tied up in knots to speak.  She 
raised her hand and put it over Firearms's. Fear, pain, desperation 
showed in her tearful eyes.  She put her hands over her face again as 
she contined to cry.  Life wouldn't be worth livng without Striker.  
She didn't want to go on and live her life without him. Reprogrammed 
or not, she would go after him and try to bring her love back. Or die 
in the attempt.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm sighs, watching Spears break down at the table and cry. He 
> walks up to her, putting a hand on her shoulder.
> 
> "It'll be ok, we'll try to get him back. I promise."
> 
> He glances around the room, "If you want, I can give you something 
to 
> ease the pain."
>
